Fred Frank

  1. Foster Name: Fred Frank
  2. Foster Family: Valentine Stellars
  3. Foster Family Alt: Stellers
  4. Location of Family: Sutton, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Sutton, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 9
  8. Date of Birth: 1892-11-24, Brooklyn, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1980
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Aurora News Register, 3 January 1980; Clay County News, 31 January 1980; "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm.
